characters: FROM AROUND THE STERN COMES COOPER--
THEY'RE SPEEDING TOWARD THE CENTER OF THE TANKER--NO WHER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper lands and rolls to his feet--he looks at the exit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jump!  JUMP! Filmore JUMPS-- Cooper catches her and HUGS HER, pulling her to the groun OLO jumps and lands--

dialogues.speaker: INT CYLINDER-
dialogues.text: The WAVE is right behind ATKINS--ROARING at him--

dialogues.speaker: EXT WATERFRONT TUNNEL
dialogues.text: Atkins LEAPS as the acid wash SPEWS out the hole, emptyin concrete, hissing- Atkins lands on his ankle and crumples up, convulsing in WASH cascading right behind him-- Cooper maintains his protective hug, perhaps a beat too l trickle-- He turns and looks back at Cooper and Filmore--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you alright!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Atkins? Atkins clutches ankle, rolling--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh Jesus, it's broken-- Olo stands up and looks--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's hurt! BLAM BLAM BLAM! Bullets rip through Olo as he stands up-- the ground as Cooper and Filmore dive behind a protective Bullets POCK-MARK the concrete, ricocheting-- Cooper pokes up and BLASTS AWAY-- NAILING a terrorist in the face--  Another one emerges from behind, GUN BLAZING-- A bullet ricochets, ripping through the skin of Cooper's Filmore decides to react-- She rolls and grabs Olo's .45-- Whips around up and FIRES WILDLY-- WASTING the gunman-- Cooper reacts and jumps up, FIRING at the front-- KILLING the last gunmen-- Cooper looks at Filmore--impressed by her shooting skills Atkins groans on the ground, hands on his ears- Filmore checks Olo--DEAD-- Cooper runs over and checks Atkins--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not broken-- Cooper extends his hand--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is!  It's broken! Cooper pulls him up--snatching a machine gun on the way--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon let's go--while we have a chance! He gestures to Filmore--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the gun! Filmore snatches up a machine gun from the dead terrorist

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: The sergeant addresses Lt. Jackson--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir all checkpoints report seeing nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever happens I want them to hold their fire!   Jackson stares at the compound through his binoculars--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're up to something...and we're goddamn helpless...

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: Richter approaches Smitty:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening at the waterfront?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're almost done piping in directly to  the Olympia.  Should have it all in about an hour or so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent.   He looks around--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the camera?  I'm coming up with all these great ideas... Suddenly another TERRORIST--BURNS--approaches Richter--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got trouble.  That bodyguard son- of-a-bitch has them running all over  the field--just took out three on the  north end!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well get someone down there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There isn't anyone! He's opened that whole sector now! Something suddenly troubles Richter--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That bastard's trying to upstage me! Smitty looks at him like he's crazy; Richter looks back a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he with the girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know--look!  They can get in now, man!  We got no one left to guard  it! Richter gives him a condescending look--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then what are you standing here for? get down there!  Now!

dialogues.speaker: EXT CORNER OF CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Cooper, Filmore, and Atkins carefully approach a corner o The compound's FENCES are a hundred yards ahead of them. Cooper looks out, then back at Filmore, then back out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's the fence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll never make it!  There's no  place to hide--we'll be cut down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How badly do you want to get out of here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atkins is right--they'll kill us for sure! Cooper looks out, then back at Filmore again--he realizes sinks in--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going first.  Taking the fire. If we go out together we're all dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They probably have guards on the roof--and they're gonna be firing at me--not you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What makes you so sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I'll be firing at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're talking about committing  suicide!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we go back that way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Around the building?  On your bum leg? You have to get out of here right now! Filmore doesn't want Cooper to go--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look you're supposed to save my life!  It's in your contract,  remember? Cooper looks back hard at her--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. It's in my contract.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about rule one:  never let the person you are protecting out of your sight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rule two:  without alternative, use  yourself as a shield. She falls silent; Cooper masks his feelings:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me, Filmore. Your father owes me a week's pay-- and I intend to collect it. Filmore just looks at him--Cooper gets down to business--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a minute you're going to hear  gunfire--if you want to live you'll run for that fence as fast as you can!  Cooper and Atkins exchange looks--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Understand? Cooper then looks at Filmore--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye-- Cooper springs off--

dialogues.speaker: COOPER
dialogues.text: He BOLTS OUT-- Within seconds--GUNFIRE-- Filmore turns to Atkins--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go! Atkins freezes in terror--grabs her--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't!  We'll be shot!

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD
dialogues.text: Cooper runs across the building, FIRING  at the roof--

dialogues.speaker: EXT CORNER
dialogues.text: Filmore tries to push a terrified Atkins away--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go! She breaks free and BOLTS for the fence as fast as she ca Atkins watches her--not knowing what to do--

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD
dialogues.text: Filmore runs as fast as she can--gunfire fills the air-- She is getting nearer to the fence--

dialogues.speaker: EXT CORNER
dialogues.text: Atkins panics, and decides to go-- He begins to hobble frantically toward the fence--

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD
dialogues.text: Filmore is about 200 yards away-- Atkins is about halfway--

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Suddenly BURNS bursts out a door and sees Atkins-- He raises his .45--AIMS-- Atkins staggers in vain-- BLAM BLAM BLAM--bullets rip through his chest--he collaps Filmore sees this and turns around--FIRES at Burns but ru Burns begins to RUN after her-- She drops the gun and SPRINTS with all of her strength-- Burns is RAPIDLY approaching-- Filmore gets to the 20 ft.-high fence--LEAPS on it--

dialogues.speaker: EXT BRUSH--
dialogues.text: A SHARPSHOOTER watching through a scope radios Jackson:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got the congresswoman in range--she's-- trying to escape--someone's after her-- POV SCOPE--Filmore climbing--blocking access to Burns who closer--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frantically)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold your fire!  Hold your fire!!!

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD
dialogues.text: We see Filmore almost home free--STRUGGLING-- WHAM!  Burns grabs her leg--she FIGHTS-- He YANKS HER off the fence-- POV SCOPE--Centered squarely at Burns' head-- SHARPSHOOTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can get him! JACKSON(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn it hold your fire! Burns drags Filmore away--

dialogues.speaker: EXT PLANT STRUCTURES
dialogues.text: Cooper sprints for the fence around the corner-- A final gunman reaches the corner of a building and FIRES Cooper rips around-- BLAM BLAM BLAM-- the gunman crashes to the ground-- Cooper SPRINTS for the fence--

dialogues.speaker: EXT BRUSH--
dialogues.text: Cooper breaks out of the brush and looks frantically for anywhere--nothing-- Suddenly-- VOICE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze! Cooper whips around to see a CAMOUFLAGED SOLDIER aiming a hands--drops the grenade launcher-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secret service--hold your fire! We got hostages coming out this way!! The soldier approaches him and scans the woods-- Cooper begins to head toward the soldier-- SOLDIER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said FREEZE!  Or I'll blow your  fucking head off-- Cooper obliges--

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: Burns speaks to Richter on a VISUAL INTERCOM--he's holdin head-- BURNS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got the girl. Richter is beside himself with delight-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh that's good news--good news! Bring her up here!  Just in time  for our final episode.   He looks around-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tell you everything is shaping up just fine, my friends...

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: With his hands on his head, Cooper is escorted at gunpoin  SOLDIER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I caught this one out back sir! Jackson looks at him, and then the soldier-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You idiot! Put the gun down!   The soldier obliges--Cooper puts his hands down-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddammit where is she?! Jackson glares at him- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A for effort Cooper--they grabbed  her going over the fence-- Cooper is devastated--can't believe it-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... JACKSON looks back at Cooper-- LT. JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a matter of seconds. Cooper is bewildered-- Suddenly a communications tech turns to Jackson-- TECH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lt. Jackson sir!  The satellite's up again! Jackson and Cooper approach the television screen-- Coopers EYES WIDEN-- CLOSE on TV SCREEN-- Filmore's is thrown into an armchair--Richter sits beside RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well well, I'd like to give a word of  thanks to our secret serviceman.  If he's providing a service, it sure seems secret to me! Richter laughs-- CLOSE REACTION of COOPER, watching, clenching his jaw--

dialogues.speaker: TV SCREEN
dialogues.text: RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever the case, I'm honored to have such a lovely panel guest for this final taping.  I'm sure my television family understands when I say we've been through a lot of laughter, and a lot of tears  together.  How do you feel about that,  Helen? Filled with hate, sick of being afraid-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go fuck yourself... RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey now!  No cussing on TV!  Well in  closing I'd like to say that there are two reasons to have that money outside in an hour.  One is my perky co-anchor here, and the second is the lives of tens of thousands of people--people just like you and me! Richter gets up, and gets extremely close to the lens, lo RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God bless each and every one of  you...goodnight. The transmission ends-- Jackson looks at Cooper, whose eyes are fixed in a steely COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a score to settle with him...

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: We see Sen Filmore, Myers, and White watching the broadca phone, gestures to the men-- ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senator they have Ryan Cooper--he made it out! Se. Filmore is deeply disappointed--it reads in his eyes- SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand--I don't understand at all! ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He requests permission to re-enter the compound! MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Permission denied--he had his chance! Any sign of assault and they'll blow the place! ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's insisting sir! MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want him to keep his ass out of it! Restrain him if you have to!  Or we'll have another Leizburg on our hands!

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: A BRINKS truck approaches the mobile camp sight, passing- JACKSON is on the phone next to an anxious Cooper-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK--I got it.  Right--yeah its here--Roger! He hangs up-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is the problem! JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The problem is I have orders from Washington--so cool you're ass off! No one goes anywhere! We're gonna  make        the deal! Jackson looks at Cooper-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Cooper!

dialogues.speaker: EXT BRINKS TRUCK
dialogues.text: Two armed guards get out and open the rear doors--we see

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Cooper walks away, disgusted with himself, deep in though A medic approaches Cooper: MEDIC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me take a look at that shoulder-- Cooper shrugs him off angrily-- The medic looks at him, then shrugs and leaves-- He stands near Jackson's command tent, staring at Chemco Glancing at the table nearby him, he sees something that It's a FLOORPLAN of the Chemco facility--under a pair of He approaches it as the SERGEANT suddenly steps out of th his way out-- Cooper resumes looking at the floorplan-- He locates CENTRAL OPERATIONS--and looks up--

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS--
dialogues.text: Richter finishes tying Filmore's hands--she stands rigid- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad you're still around Helen-- we have a lot of catching up to do. He produces a new blinfold-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you don't mind all this--it's just that the networks will eat it up, you know... FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to pay for this... RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it all backwards, Helen--but  that's OK, you work for the government... He ties the blindfold around her eyes-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will be getting paid for this--how much I don't know, but let's put it this way-- He gets close to her ear-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not gonna fit in a damn suitcase. He finishes tying the blindfold--

dialogues.speaker: EXT ROOF OF CHEMCO
dialogues.text: The cameramen--Black and Green--now act as PILOTS--they c and head to two separate HELICOPTERS-- They get in and START THEM UP--

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Jackson hears the helicopters starting up-- LT. JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do they think they're doing?  He heads over to the table to get his binoculars, and not -he looks around-- LT JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: COOPER
dialogues.text: Jackson looks up, knowing full well who took it-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit! He picks up the field telephone-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me Washington!

dialogues.speaker: EXT COMPOUND GROUNDS
dialogues.text: A GUNMAN keeps a lookout for any activity--suddenly-- POV something moving through the brush outside the fence- He squints but sees nothing-- He flips his NIGHT VISION GLASSES down around his eyes-- POV--someone RUNNING through the brush-- The gunman FIRES--AGAIN-- Someone is RUNNING toward the gate--LIGHTNING FAST-- The gunman fires again--CAN'T HIT HIM-- COOPER rolls, dives, and does his best to dodge the gunfi This PISSES OFF the gunman, who gets up and FIRES at Coop But Cooper is in, safe behind a corner of the building-- The gunman grabs his walkie-- GUNMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone just went over the fence south end!

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: Richter perks up at this, answers back as Filmore looks o RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our first deserter--who was it? GUNMAN(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No--INCOMING INCOMING--he's inside-- Filmore realizes its Cooper--Richter is disappointed-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like I have to have a talk with the boys in D.C...

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHEMCO
dialogues.text: A man brandishing a GRENADE LAUNCHER runs toward the soun He approaches a CORNER, sliding up against the wall, aimi Getting closer... He is JUMPED from behind--Cooper grabs his neck-- The man struggles--Cooper has him in a STRANGLEHOLD-- The gunman pulls a COMBAT BLADE from his side-- But Cooper GRABS the man's arm and JAMS the blade into hi dead-- Cooper grabs the grenade launcher--checking the floorplan WALKWAY that leads him to central operations-- Cooper BURSTS THROUGH THE DOOR--INTO THE BUILDING--

dialogues.speaker: INT VAT AREA
dialogues.text: Cooper rips ups a tall flight of steps to a thin GRATED W vats of chemicals-- Suddenly from ABOVE-- MUTT pounces on Cooper-- The man stagger across the precipitous walkway--Mutt STRU which falls on the grating-- BAM!--Cooper elbows Mutt in the face, then lands a COMBIN Mutt retaliates--swinging FURIOUSLY as the men struggle f SUDDENLY BURNS and another GUNMAN CHARGES up the stairs-- Cooper jumps--grabs a pipe-- And SLAMS Mutt off the walkway with both feet-- Mutt yells and falls 40 feet to his death-- POW POW POW!  Burns and the gunman fire at Nick who hits He grabs the grenade launcher-- The gunmen DIVE as-- The GRENADE hits a large VAT--IT BLOWS in a LOUD EXPLOSIO Acid CASCADES down on the screaming terrorists, INCINERAT

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Lt Jackson is on the phone, people are screaming, soldier everyone has a GAS MASKS on-- LT. JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's been an explosion, we have scattered gunfire--I don't know if they're going to blow the place... (listening)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that!   He slams the phone down and addresses the sergeant: LT. JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get everyone on stand by--alert status! We might have to move!

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: Sen. Filmore, Myers, and white talk on SPEAKERPHONE to Ri BROADCAST on TV, slightly delayed--but his expression dea RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we had a deal.  MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course we have a deal!  We have cash on site!  Everything you asked for! RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you to keep everyone at bay. You let me down! MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not our man dammit!  We can't  stop him--he's a loose cannon! RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm very disappointed, gentlemen,  very disappointed...   Richter shakes his head, and picks up a DIGITAL METAL TIM CONSOLE--the timer displays 5:00--he depresses a button a
The men watching react anxiously-- RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry but we're outta time!   Richter GRABS FILMORE around the neck, into the frame-- The senator watches-- SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen! Filmore struggles on screen--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do this!  We held up our end damn it!  What more do you want? RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to thank Chemco--for making the world a deadlier place to live.   The senator can hardly control himself-- SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That...bastard... Richter gives a final look to the camera-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I guess it's anchor's aweigh! So long, suckers! Richter reaches for the camera cable and YANKS IT--The sc

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: Richter yanks the blindfold off Filmore. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a natural in front of the camera, you know that? Smitty approaches Richter as the last men file out of Cen SMITTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Choppers are ready.  Let's get the fuck out of here. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time gentleman--I hope you enjoyed the tour-- He grabs Helen out of her chair and they hastily make the PAN to the TIMER--3:59--3:58--3:57--

dialogues.speaker: INT STAIRWELL
dialogues.text: Richter pushes Filmore up the stairs-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the fun begins Helen--you like to travel?   The others follow behind up the stairs--

dialogues.speaker: INT HALLWAY--
dialogues.text: Cooper races down the hall--

dialogues.speaker: INT ANOTHER HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Cooper turns the corner and checks the floorplan-- He looks up and SPRINTS--

dialogues.speaker: INT DEAD END CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: Cooper approaches a DOOR at the end--it reads CENTRAL OPE

dialogues.speaker: PERSONNEL ONLY--
dialogues.text: The door is THICK STEEL--and LOCKED-- Cooper struggles to open it--no luck-- He checks the grenade launcher--ONE GRENADE LEFT-- He runs back the other way-- Hew turns and FIRES the launcher-- The grenade EXPLODES--sending a ball of FIRE down the hal The flames clear and the door is partially blasted off, h hinge--  Cooper runs down the hall avoiding the licking flames and

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: Cooper arrives to find everyone is GONE-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son-of-a-bitch-- He sees the TIMER--cross-wired in a maddening way--imposs
He looks toward the other door and BOLTS out--as fast as

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHEMCO ROOF
dialogues.text: The helicopters are ready to go-- Richter shoves Filmore into one of the helicopters as the one-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step lively--step lively-- THE SECOND HELICOPTER takes off--

dialogues.speaker: INT STAIRWAY
dialogues.text: Cooper FLIES up a stairwell--

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: We see the helicopter lift off and go away-- The sergeant approaches Jackson-- SERGEANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can take either one of them out  now, sir-- LT. JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We haven't got authorization!  They still have a hostage-- Jackson looks behind him-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get everyone out of here--They've  timed it to blow!

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHEMCO ROOF
dialogues.text: The second helicopter slowly lifts off RICHTER (cheerfully)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We came, we saw, we looted--

dialogues.speaker: INT HELICOPTER
dialogues.text: Richter is sitting next to Filmore watching the building RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll tell ya life is a gas... when you've got a pretty girl  by your side--

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS--
dialogues.text: The timer continues, in the room strewn with dead bodies-

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Jackson watches intently--

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: Se. Filmore, Myers, and White watch the building from a t helplessly--

dialogues.speaker: INT CENTRAL OPERATIONS
dialogues.text: We see the timer--every couple of seconds we cut CLOSER--
There is a seconds pause-- BOOOOMMMM!  Central Operations EXPLODES IN A FIREBALL--se

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHEMCO
dialogues.text: A series of HUGE EXPLOSIONS rip through the windows at Ch

dialogues.speaker: INT HELICOPTER
dialogues.text: Richter and Filmore watch the destruction from above-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hooooo-eeeee! Filmore looks out, letting out an anguished whisper: FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper... No one hears her.

dialogues.speaker: EXT SKY
dialogues.text: The helicopters disappear into the night sky--

dialogues.speaker: EXT FIELD OUTSIDE CHEMCO
dialogues.text: Jackson watches the destruction and grabs the phone-- JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got two choppers headed east- northeast--get special forces on their tail--now!

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: The men watch, dumbstruck-- MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got the nerve-gas. He turns to White, who has his head in his hands... MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We may have to take them down! SEN FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you mad!  My daughter's on one of those helicopters! MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they're carrying enough nerve gas to kill millions of people I'd say we have little choice, Senator! White interrupts--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHITE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wouldn't take it on the helicopters. He'd transport it through pipelines that connect Chemco to the waterfront... MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What! WHITE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were probably topping off a docked tanker while he stalled for time--without anyone being the wiser... A dismayed look crosses White's face-- WHITE (dismayed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KZ70709 would be worth hundreds of  millions on the black market. Sen. Filmore is looking at a wallet photo of his daughter SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He doesn't even need her... He looks up, grasping for a thread of hope-- SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Cooper--where is he? MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in there... They watch the image of the burning building on the TV... Sen. Filmore nods gravely, despairingly... Myers gets up and looks out-- MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy Richter just upped the stakes. It's time we cracked down. He looks at the senator MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry Henry.  We won't let them out of our site--this isn't over yet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two HELICOPTERS land near a TANKER, the OLYMPIA, dock end of a PIPELINE, the surviving members of the takeover hurrying on board as the ship prepares to depart-- RICHTER gets out, keeping Filmore securely by his side CAPTAIN STOCKTON, a windburned, grizzled old scab, cheerf STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right on time, Richter-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen this is Captain Stockton-- Captain, Congresswoman Helen Filmore, the pride of Ohio. Stockton extends his hand--Filmore just stares at him-- The captain looks her over, tipping his cap-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma'am... Richter glances back at A HANDFUL OF SOLDIERS on alert with weapons drawn, mainta distance-- Richter smiles at Stockton-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our traveler's insurance, you know what I mean? STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha.  We've been filling barrels  all day--we've got  hell of a stockpile. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we head out. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agreed--let's move it. STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you hungry?  We can discuss some final arrangements over some slop in the galley. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain it would be impossible to turn down such a gracious request. Richter looks at Filmore-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What say, Helen?  You haven't eaten all day--and come to think of it-- neither have I! Stockton and Richter laugh as Richter shoves her forward-

dialogues.speaker: A COUPLE SCUMMY-LOOKING SEAMEN
dialogues.text: Leer at Filmore as she boards, grinning, looking like the dumpster--they trade snorts from a hip flask, their DRUNK ideas-- They remove the last chain mooring the ship and get on bo And then we see a HELICOPTER...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STORAGE HATCH DOOR above the landing bar SLOWLY OPENS-- We see COOPER exit the cramped storage hatch--clothes dir he quickly gets his bearings-- When all is clear he LOOKS OUT at the Olympia--pulling ou He JUMPS and grabs the metal gate around the deck, pullin

dialogues.speaker: EXT OCEAN
dialogues.text: The Olympia heads out to sea, Malaysia retreating in the

dialogues.speaker: INT OIL FUEL BUNKER--
dialogues.text: Cooper moves in and out of shadows below deck, getting hi bearings-- He sees a SAILOR checking an oil tank reading--he leaves Cooper moves on--

dialogues.speaker: INT GALLEY
dialogues.text: Seated in the galley, Richter, Stockton, and Filmore have dinner and wine. Richter and Stockton voraciously eat and drink, while Fil .. STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My crew is going to work alongside with your men, don't worry--we're a team! RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why should I worry?  Is there a  problem? STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there was uh, a little dissent about the amount of the bonus-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dissent? STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, when we reach Kompong Som-- Stockton chews and swallows-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I explained your generosity, and that settled the whole matter. Stockton freshens Richter's wine glass-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to be back in business with you again, old friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Richter raises his glass: RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To the suckers of the world!  Without them we'd never succeed! The men click glasses--Filmore just listens-- Richter explains to Stockton-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helen's a little upset.  She lost her  whole entourage of hangers-on today-- almost bought it herself, didn't she?   Well don't you worry Helen--from now  on its smooooth sailing. The two men laugh--

dialogues.speaker: INT LOWER DECK
dialogues.text: Cooper stealthily moves through a darkened corridor-- Up ahead a DOOR OPENS-- Cooper presses himself against the wall--hidden by a shad TWO SEAMEN exit the room--closing the door behind them-- SEAMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I was a thousand miles from my old lady on a free port and just got paid-- ten grand in my pocket... After a few seconds they turn a corner, and their voices Cooper steps out of the shadows and carefully approaches He puts his ear to the door, hears nothing, then SLOWLY o

dialogues.speaker: INT SUPPLY ROOM
dialogues.text: Cooper FLIPS the LIGHTSWITCH-- We see METAL SHELVES filled with supplies-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Merry Christmas... Cooper quickly scans the shelves--he finds CANDLES, takes rummage-- He approaches a shelf containing CLEANING SUPPLIES, grabb Suddenly--we hear the sound of FOOTSTEPS approaching--Coo A SEASICK TERRORIST enters the supply room, looking very Cooper watches as the Terrorist looks for DRAMAMINE--groa SEASICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God...I'm gonna puke... where is that shit... He finds the first aid supplies-- He pulls out a packet of TABLETS and fumbles with the wra He takes the pills and gulps them down-- Burping, he then STAGGERS out of the room-- When it's clear, Cooper continues searching-- He finds a box containing INDUSTRIAL COVERALLS--the same men-- He quickly grabs one and RIPS OPEN the PLASTIC--

dialogues.speaker: INT NEW CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: Richter escorts Filmore to her quarters-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you enjoy your accommodations Helen.  I want you to enjoy your time here with us-- Helen breaks her silence--faces Richter-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You understand that they're watching our every move right now--you think you're just going to sail away? RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It seems to me we are just sailing away.   They haven't sunk us yet, have they? Besides, don't you worry your pretty little head about that.  It's all been taken care of. Richter stops Filmore, and looks at her-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're not too happy at this point.  It's too bad we weren't able to meet elsewhere, under different circumstances... FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like where--in your dreams? Before Richter can respond, the seasick TERRORIST hurries SEASICK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry--I was getting some seasick  pills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not to worry... He keeps his eyes on Filmore-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were just saying goodnight. Without another word, Filmore turns and enters her quarte behind herself right in Richter's face. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard her.  With your life. Richter heads down the corridor toward his own quarters-- The guard looks miserable and seasick--

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND A CORNER
dialogues.text: Unseen by all, Cooper watches the whole thing-- He nods, knowing where to get her when the time comes-- He looks back behind him, looks back at Filmore's door, t He heads back the way he came--

dialogues.speaker: INT RADIO ROOM
dialogues.text: Stockton enters the radio room, checking in-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any news from Kompong Som? OPERATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yessir they've confirmed our E.T.A. and they're ready to pipe the cargo. STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.  Won't be long now, my friend... soon we're gonna be very wealthy...

dialogues.speaker: INT RICHTER'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Richter pours BRANDY into a snifter, whistling "Popeye th back on the day, beside himself with insane confidence-- He laughs to himself, as he swirls the brandy in the snif He scans the shelf of BOOKS before him, selecting a copy RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me...goddamn Ishmael... He laughs and gets comfortable, turning to page one, sipp

dialogues.speaker: INT FILMORE'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Having turned down the lights, Filmore sits up in her bed She gazes through the shadows, exhausted but defiant-- The ship's steady swaying pacifies her.  She fights to ke .they close... She opens them again but it's no use...they close again.

dialogues.speaker: INT CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: The two randy SEAMEN from earlier round a corner-- They see the TERRORIST GUARD at Filmore's door-- RANDY SEAMAN1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at him--he's ready to spew... They approach him-- RANDY SEAMAN2 (quietly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking a little green, brother... TERRORIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know how you fucking do this! RANDY SEAMAN 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to get your sea legs. Hell I used to get sick all the time. RANDY SEAMAN 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's easy when the boat is going UP, and DOWN, and UP, and DOWN,... The terrorist doesn't need this... RANDY SEAMAN 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man I got so nauseous once...it was worse than the time I accidentally drank a cup of tobacco spit, could have sworn there were a few loogies in it-- The terrorist can't take much more--  TERRORIST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus shut up! RANDY SEAMAN 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man in rough weather this boat just  rocks, and rocks, and rocks... RANDY SEAMAN 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah and if you get  bad cook that just keeps feeding you salty pork all the  time it's enough to-- The terrorist SPRINGS UP and flees down the hallway, hand The two seamen look at each other and smile drunkenly--

dialogues.speaker: INT FILMORE'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Filmore sleeps in dim shadows on her bed-- The door to her quarters OPENS and CLOSES with a CREAK-- Filmore BOLTS to attention-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is it! The two seamen stand like ghostly figures in the dim shad Concealing her fear, Filmore gets up and faces them-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you out of here at once. They push her back on the bed with malicious intent-- RANDY SEAMAN 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Begging your pardon, ma'am--but your wants don't quite enter into it-- The lunge for her and she SCREAMS, trying to claw herself They PAW at her--she defends herself, KNEEING one hard in SCRATCHING the other--                                 This only fuels their determination-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helllp! One grabs her, covering her mouth, stifling her cries-- The other RIPS OPEN her DRESS-- She struggles in vain as the seaman fondles her-- Loosening his pants the other seaman works himself up-- Filmore shuts her eyes, trying to block out the horror-- Suddenly the door to the cabin BURSTS OPEN-- A SHADOWY FIGURE OF A MAN rushes in, pulling the rapist o Filmore falls to the floor, struggling to see what's happ One seaman PULLS A KNIFE-- The man WRENCHES the seaman's arm yanking it HARD behind his ARM around his neck--YANKING HARD on the jaw--BREAKIN The other seaman CHARGES and catches the BLADE square in The two seaman collapse to the ground--DEAD. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper! SNAP!  RICHTER turns on the light, wiping his hands as if of flies-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry what did you say? Filmore pales, then says nothing. Richter scrutinizes her for a second-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry about this.  I'm going to have to have a few words with Stockton--his men need a lesson  in manners... Filmore looks very sexy and vulnerable at this moment-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you'll find my quarters more to your liking-- She looks up at him in disbelief--

dialogues.speaker: INT BOILER ROOM
dialogues.text: Cooper SLINKS into the boiler room-- He sees an ENGINEER manning the complicated devices that to the TURBINE BLADES. Cooper looks through a metal screen door and sees what he He silently enters the room and opens the gas can-- He pours the LYE into the can--it SIZZLES as he plunks th He takes the container and begins to SHAKE IT-- VOICE(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Cooper whips around to see an ENGINEER-- ENGINEER1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing? COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hi. I'm one of Richter's men. ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? The engineer is suspicious but Cooper plays it like a HIC COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  He wanted to make sure the  boats on deck are fueled... ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are. Cooper plays it cool-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... He puts the gas can down-- The other ENGINEER approaches-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.  I'm beat enough as it is... He smiles at the two stone-faced engineers.  Cooper feign boiler room and walks out in the middle of it... COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God-damn... The engineers follow him... COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's one hell of an engine! He looks at the two men-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Far cry from the old outboard back home, you know what I mean, boys? The engineers begin to warm slightly-- ENGINEER2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn straight. Cooper focuses on a large, heavily gauged metal CONTRAPTI COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This must power the turbines, huh? ENGINEER1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorta, yeah... Cooper walks around like a kid in a candy store--the engi idiot-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit, what happens when this thing goes down? ENGINEER2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got backup power over there. Cooper looks over at an electronic PANEL--The AUXILIARY A ENGINEER1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry junior, we're prepared for everything. Cooper nods like a dolt, smiling-- POW!  Cooper SMASHES the first engineer in the face--a LI crashes to the ground-- In the split second that follows Cooper WHIPS his   foot around and CONNECTS with the 2nd engineer's SKULL--s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah you're prepared alright... Cooper heads over to the GAS CAN--picks it up-- He heads over to A CABINET that has a coffee machine, mic He rips open the drawers, finding a STEAK KNIFE...A CAN O He opens the GAS CAN with the opener--turning it upside d a brown substance resembling "SLIME" plops out on the cou He glances back over at the GENERATOR--

dialogues.speaker: INT BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Stockton enters the bridge--meeting his FIRST MATE-- FIRST MATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're steady on course Captain. STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least some of us are!  No more drinking on this goddamn ship! He looks out the window-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, Andrews lock her down-- FIRST MATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir. Stockton settles back for what he anticipates will be a r seas--

dialogues.speaker: EXT SEA
dialogues.text: The tanker makes its way through the moonlit waters--

dialogues.speaker: TIGHT ON A RADAR
dialogues.text: Showing a blip northeast of the center of the grid--

dialogues.speaker: INT BOAT
dialogues.text: A radar operator from ANOTHER SHIP is monitoring the tank OPERATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's keeping a steady course, straight for Cambodia...

dialogues.speaker: EXT SEA
dialogues.text: We see the COAST GUARD CUTTER slicing through the water, very safe distance--

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: A very haggard looking White, Myers, and Sen. Filmore   sit amid TV screens, CNN updates, and assistants on phone MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like Richter isn't acting alone--he's heading into some dangerous waters. SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's as good as gone... MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't think like that!  We're watching them like a hawk--he's  bound to trip up, make one false move-- WHITE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Richter can't run forever. The senator has given up all hope...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEN. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know about that...

dialogues.speaker: INT RICHTER'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Her posture stiff and protected, Filmore sits in a chair moves around her. She keeps the corner of her eye on him, unsure of what he FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose...you think I should thank you. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, you should. He pours two glasses of BRANDY. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overnight I've put us in the history books, Filmore.  It won't be long till we're legends in our own time. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems to me you'll be dead soon, Richter. Richter bristles-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One hostage is not enough--you're a marked man. Richter smiles at her-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much as I love you, Helen, you don't think I would have put all my eggs in one basket, would you?  Anything funny and... He laughs with delight-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...they have a catastrophe on their hands! He looks around the room-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I felt something when I first saw you.  And I know you felt something too. Filmore is disgusted with him.  He approaches her. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're one in the same, Helen.  We both  want it all. And we'll do what we can to  get it--isn't that the truth?  She ignores him-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I watched you as your old man's reputation went down the toilet--"misappropriation of funds"--you stayed out of it like a pro.   Filmore's eyes fill with tears. RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, it paid off--you broke away from the old guard, congresswoman.  It won't be long till they're calling you Senator Filmore-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it won't be enough, it will never be enough.  I know.  I understand you. He offers her a glass of brandy, which she weakly accepts RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To us...and to having everything. She just holds the glass, beyond caring-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, drink up. FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want any... RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I insist... FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said I don't want any, goddammit! Richter GRABS the hair in the back of her head--HARD-- She freezes-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said--I insist! She sips the brandy, staring hard at Richter--HATE burnin back, determined-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a very headstrong woman-- sometimes you tend to forget the impulses of your body--your desires-- He grabs her closer--VIOLENTLY-- Then-- BOOOOOMMMM!  A huge explosion is heard--the two feel a tr Filmore takes her brandy glass and SMASHES it over Richte it-- This enrages Richter, who yanks her by her arm and slams pulls out his GUN and shoves it hard into her temple-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what's happening, princess-- He shoves her out the door--

dialogues.speaker: EXT BRIDGE--
dialogues.text: Stockton tries to radio the engine room, to no avail-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The damn line's dead! FIRST MATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rudder's dead--navgation's dead--

dialogues.speaker: INT STAIRWELL
dialogues.text: Stockton grabs a FLASHLIGHT and a FIRE EXTINGUISHER and f A SEAMAN goes after him-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like the goddamn engine blew!

dialogues.speaker: INT CORRIDOR--
dialogues.text: Stockton runs down the corridor with the seaman-- passing COOPER, who emerges from a dark CORNER--he runs t

dialogues.speaker: INT ANOTHER CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: Two beams of light cut across the darkness--

dialogues.speaker: STOCKTON RICHTER
dialogues.text: Who's there!                        Who's that! STOCKTON and RICHTER surprise themselves with each other' faces-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell happened! Stockton pushes past him--running toward the boiler room- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got trouble-- Richter follows Stockton down the hall, dragging Filmore RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we adrift-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I don't get power up we are! RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the anchor! STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't--it's power driven! RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your men to do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thing weighs more than a ton-- you want to roll up your sleeves and try it?!

dialogues.speaker: INT BOILER ROOM
dialogues.text: Stockton CRASHES IN--OTHERS ARE THERE--including the two FLAMES engulf the main GENERATOR, which is completely des Stockton FURIOUSLY DOUSES the fire with the extinguisher, the same thing--

dialogues.speaker: INT CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: The SEASICK GUARD from earlier is in the same area, looki any noise-- Suddenly there is a WHISTLING NOISE-- THUNK! The STEAK KNIFE juts out of the guards throat as h gurgling-- Cooper grabs the guard's SEMI AUTOMATIC and KICKS HIM out He stands back and KICKS the door to Filmore's quarters--

dialogues.speaker: INT FILMORE'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Through the moonlight Cooper can only find the two RANDY COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck!   Determined not to let her slip out of his hands again, he

dialogues.speaker: INT ENGINE ROOM
dialogues.text: Having successfully doused the flames, a soaked, sweating Filmore inspect the damage along with a couple of others- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get this shit-crate running!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stockton glares at him--looking around the smoke-filled r STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This "shit-crate" just lost her main engine--it isn't like changing a bulb! Stockton heads up some steps to the AUXILIARY ALTERNATOR- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The auxiliary alternator can get us lit and moving, but not for long-- Stockton opens a DOOR PANEL and unlocks a POWER SWITCH--h locks it in place-- The lights buzz on--Stockton looks at Richter-- STOCKTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems like we got ourselves a saboteur, Richter! Suddenly Filmore's EYES WIDEN with hope-- Stockton turns to hear something POP-- He sees the BACK OF THE CONSOLE OPENED, and two POWER WIR

dialogues.speaker: BOOOOOMMM
dialogues.text: The alternator EXPLODES, ripping Stockton and several oth LEAPS out of harms way, dragging Filmore into the hall-- A ROARING FIRE ensues as the ship goes black again--

dialogues.speaker: EXT CORRIDOR
dialogues.text: Richter heads out running, dragging an exhausted and dirt Two terrorists--BLACK and SMITTY--catch up-- BLACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck is going on? RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a problem on our hands gentlemen!   A FIGURE approaches UP AHEAD-- RICHTER FIRES WILDLY at the man--SIX BULLETS in two secon The man splatters against the wall--it is RED-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good shot! He looks at SMITTY without remorse, all the time walking RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dump what barrels we can overboard  and get the launches ready--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Richter yanks Filmore away as the two terrorists take off

dialogues.speaker: INT RADIO ROOM--
dialogues.text: The OPERATOR is hammering out something in Morse code, re the only working piece of equipment he has-- Suddenly he is CHOKED FROM BEHIND-- Cooper shoves his GUN BARREL into the man's temple--the m COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you know your Morse code. I got something I want you to  spell for me! OPERATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't kill me please-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first letter is C... The man looks it up and enters something but Cooper is to harder on his head-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wasn't a C now was it--I'm  gonna give your sorry ass one more chance-- The operator enters the correct letter-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: INT COAST GUARD CUTTER
dialogues.text: The radar operator notices the Olympia is veering off cou OPERATOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like they're changing course, headed due north--

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: An assistant turns to Sen. Filmore, Myers and White-- ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sirs! The men whip around-- ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The coast guard is reporting a Morse signal coming from the  Olympia! MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A distress call? ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah--a distress call-- The men wait-- ASSISTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper--SOS-- Senator Filmore's EYES LIGHT UP--

dialogues.speaker: EXT CARGO HATCH
dialogues.text: Black and Smitty are rolling sealed BARRELS of the binary GANGWAY--one chemical in a green barrel, the other in a b They drop them into to the sea, leaving a floating trail . Suddenly-- BOOOOMMM!  An explosion RIPS through a lower deck, the fi through the crippled tanker-- BLACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck this!  Let's get out of here! The two men throw two more barrels overboard and take off

dialogues.speaker: EXT OTHER END OF DECK
dialogues.text: Richter prepares the LAUNCH to descend into the water--

dialogues.speaker: EXT DECK
dialogues.text: Black and Smitty head toward another launch on the opposi Then Smitty sees Cooper, sprinting from back at the stern SMITTY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit! They aim and FIRE at him--he DIVES for cover-- He fires back--NAILING BLACK in the HEAD--he slams to the

dialogues.speaker: EXT BOW--
dialogues.text: Richter hears the gunfire and turns around-- Cooper dashes from one cover to another as Smitty fires-- Filmore sees him-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper! Richter is truly amazed by this, but has no time for it-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on princess--its time we had a talk with your friend--

dialogues.speaker: EXT DECK
dialogues.text: Cooper ducks down behind a cargo derrick, avoiding the gu ammo-- Suddenly-- RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper?! Cooper perks up-- RICHTER(O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper I think you better come out-- Cooper fingers his trigger... and WHIPS OUT-- Richter has his gun to Filmore's head-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome back from the dead!  I don't know how you did it but at this point I don't really care. COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over Richter.  Let her go! RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over?  You slowed up my cargo that's for sure but least we forget Cooper your assignment was to protect the Congresswoman-- Cooper wants to make a move, but can't-- Smitty slowly approaches behind him-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So far your operation's a success but it would be a shame if the patient died now wouldn't it? Cooper says nothing-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I want you to put the gun down-- Cooper hesitates-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So help me sweet Jesus Christ I'll blow her fucking brains out right here and now--PUT THE GUN DOWN! Cooper obliges watching Richter for as much as one false behind Cooper-- Richter regains his composure-- RICHTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you! He gestures to SMITTY, who raises his rifle-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper! BAM!  Smitty's rifle butt SMASHES Cooper on the head-- he falls and Smitty KICKS HIM IN THE FACE--HARD-- Cooper rolls violently as Smitty kicks his face again--WH Blood runs out of Cooper's mouth-- Richter drags a struggling Filmore into the launch and pu Smitty runs over to another launch and prepares to lower BOOOMMM!  another explosion rips through the ship--it lur

dialogues.speaker: EXT PORT HULL
dialogues.text: Richter and Filmore fall as the launch swings out and sla of the hull-- Cooper slowly comes to--completely disoriented--he shakes drunk boxer POV of a blurry, double-vision deck--Smitty descending in Cooper gets up, staggers, falls-- Smitty disappears from the deck, descending--

dialogues.speaker: EXT PORT HULL--
dialogues.text: Richter and Filmore land in the water as Richter shoves F fires up the OUTBOARD motor--

dialogues.speaker: EXT STARBOARD HULL
dialogues.text: Smitty is descending when suddenly-- Cooper LEAPS and lands on the deck of the launch-- SMITTY rams him, attempting to send Cooper overboard-- Struggling to keep his bearings, Cooper RETALIATES-- smashing Smitty in the face-- The two struggle-- One of the ROPES on the STERN begins to break as the men POW!  Smitty connects with Cooper--AGAIN-- But Cooper whips around and BACKHANDS Smitty before PASTI combination-- SNAP!  The stern line gives way as the boat swings in a d the hull-- Smitty tumbles backwards, grabbing the OUTBOARD to keep f Cooper DIVES and yanks the RIPCORD-- The engine ROARS to life, the PROPELLER grazing Smitty's Cooper YANKS the engine up-- The propeller SLICES OPEN SMITTY'S CHEST as he crashes in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The launch slowly descends--

dialogues.speaker: EXT PORT HULL
dialogues.text: Richter and Filmore speed away from the tanker as an EXPL sending debris through the air--

dialogues.speaker: EXT STARBOARD HULL
dialogues.text: Cooper lets the last ropes free as Smitty climbs back up out-- He POUNCES on Cooper--who breaks free-- Cooper SMASHES SMITTY with a backhand-- Smitty CHARGES and PUSHES COOPER OVER-- Cooper's legs hook the edge as he falls in backwards-- He struggles to get up but Smitty SHOVES his face under, Cooper swallows water, suffocating-- Smitty clenches his teeth, using all his might to keep Co In a desperate surge of energy Cooper LIFTS HIS LEGS and

dialogues.speaker: CHOKING HIM--
dialogues.text: Smitty struggles to break free--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Cooper grimace and JERK-- SNAP--Smitty's jaw goes askew and his neck BREAKS-- Cooper FLIPS him overboard--the two men crash into the wa Cooper splashes to the surface coughing and struggles on propeller into the water---the boat SPEEDS OFF--

dialogues.speaker: EXT SEA
dialogues.text: Richter and Filmore round the stern as COOPER approaches Richter speeds maniacally--wind RIPPING through his hair-

dialogues.speaker: FROM AROUND THE STERN COMES COOPER--
dialogues.text: Richter raises his gun and FIRES at the fast-approaching Cooper ducks and aims his boat at theirs-- BANG BANG BANG--CLICK! CLICK!  Richter is out of ammo-- Filmore charges at him, trying to wrench him from the ste He CRACKS HER ACROSS THE FACE--she falls to the deck-- COOPER JAMS the boat into HIGH GEAR and begins to run par Richter slams his boat into Cooper's--Cooper's into his-- Then Cooper does the unexpected-- He LEAPS off the boat--ONTO RICHTER'S-- Cooper's boat begins to SPIRAL MADLY-- Cooper POUNCES on Richter--but Richter grabs Cooper by th the deck--                         Like two sinewy springs Nick legs send Richter airborne-- Richter crashes back-- the boat spins FURIOUSLY out of control-- Bleeding from the corner of her mouth Filmore reaches up keep her steady--the STEERING WHEEL-- the two men exchange WITHERING BLOWS as they stagger arou In a last-chance attempt at killing Cooper once for all h offensive that has Cooper's ears ringing-- But Cooper SURGES--sending Richter crashing to the stern- Cooper staggers back and looks ahead--

dialogues.speaker: THEY'RE SPEEDING TOWARD THE CENTER OF THE TANKER--NO WHER
dialogues.text: Cooper GRABS Filmore and YANKS HER UP-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: JUMP
dialogues.text: They JUMP from the speeding BOAT tumbling violently into Richter looks up for a SECOND-- WHAM!!!! THE BOAT EXPLODES IN A FIREBALL against the hull Richter--

dialogues.speaker: EXT TANKER
dialogues.text: BOOOMMMM!!!  More explosions on the tanker create a domin Cooper swims as hard as he can, drags Filmore toward thei circle-- COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay clear-- Cooper gets hold of a MOORING ROPE on the of the dangerou struggles aboard-- He runs and kills the engine--the boat slows down-- Cooper circles and nears FILMORE--he reaches out for her- She extends her hand but HE MISSES HER-- Cooper juices up the boat and CIRCLES AROUND HER AGAIN--t by the hand-- He yanks her safely on board-- The two collapse to the deck as a series of EXPLOSIONS on

dialogues.speaker: ESCALATE--
dialogues.text: Cooper fires up the boat and heads away from the tanker a BOOOOMMMM!!!! The tanker is BLOWN TO SMITHEREENS--it's hu

dialogues.speaker: EXT COAST GUARD CUTTER
dialogues.text: A sentry flashes a powerful beam out toward the flaming, Filmore and Cooper their boat a little speck in the water SENTRY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got survivors--about fifteen hundred feet southwest! We then see JACKSON step out on deck and look through his

dialogues.speaker: EXT SEA
dialogues.text: Jackson sees Cooper and Filmore--very much alive-- Jackson lowers his binoculars in disbelief, smiling--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACKSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That son-of-a-bitch!

dialogues.speaker: INT ROOM IN DC
dialogues.text: Myers is on the phone-- MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you absolutely certain?!... Stand by! He looks to Myers and Sen. Filmore-- MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over! Sen. Filmore drops his head in despair-- MYERS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper got her out! Filmore looks up, as if the clouds parted to reveal heave

dialogues.speaker: EXT SEA
dialogues.text: Passing floating barrels of the BINARY CHEMICALS,  they r and toward the RISING SUN.  On the horizon, the COAST GUA A wounded, exhausted Cooper and Filmore trade looks.  Mor an attraction in their eyes.  But neither really knows ho COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well Filmore-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well Cooper... COOPER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you're not going to make that dinner after all... FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess not Cooper...  She looks out at dawn spreading across the horizon-- FILMORE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but you can't say we didn't try... The boat heads off into the distance...
